about_the_game:
Show your support to the game and enjoy extra content from the game:
  • 5 new masks
  • Complete soundtracks, including "One day" full-length version!

Mad Experiments: Escape Room is a multiplayer narrative escape game made for advanced players.

Alone or with teammates, you have 60 minutes to explore, solve, and escape!
detailed_description:
Show your support to the game and enjoy extra content from the game:
  • 5 new masks
  • Complete soundtracks, including "One day" full-length version!

Mad Experiments: Escape Room is a multiplayer narrative escape game made for advanced players.

Alone or with teammates, you have 60 minutes to explore, solve, and escape!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, Ubuntu 18.04 or more recent
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Vulkan drivers for the best experience. Also compatible with Mesa drivers.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, Ubuntu 18.04 or more recent
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Vulkan drivers for the best experience. Also compatible with Mesa drivers.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra 10.12 or more recent
  • Processor: i5 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 / AMD equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Sierra 10.12 or more recent
  • Processor: i5 3.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+ (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD FX series or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 / AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+ (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 4650 / AMD FX-8320 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 970/AMD 390 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Escape with style with a choice of 4 unique skins for your mask! Mad Experiments: Escape Room is a multiplayer narrative escape game made for advanced players. Alone or with teammates, you have 60 minutes to explore, solve, and escape!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Japanese, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
